greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array read by antidiagonals, m>=0, n>=0, A(m,n) = sum{k=0..n} sum{j=0..m} sum{i=0..m} (-1)^(j+i)*C(i,j)*C(n,k)^(m+1)*(n+1)^j*(k+1)^(m-j)/(k+1)^m.
maple: pow := (a,b) -> if a=0 and b=0 then 1 else a^b fi;
for m from 0 to 6 do seq(A198060(m,n), n=0..6) od;
mathematica: a[m_, n_] := Sum[ Sum[ Sum[(-1)^(j + i)*Binomial[i, j]*Binomial[n, k]^(m+1)*(n+1)^j*(k+1)^(m-j)/(k+1)^m, {i, 0, m}], {j, 0, m}], {k, 0, n}]; Table[ a[m-n, n], {m, 0, 9}, {n, 0, m}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 27 2013 *)
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Nov 01 2011
